snippet: Congress has sent President Obama a $612 billion defense policy bill that he has threatened to veto over an continuing partisan battle about government spending.
abstract: Senate approves defense spending bill, which Pres Obama has threatened to veto, in partisan scuffle over government spending; possible veto would mark only fifth time a United States president has rejected defense authorization bill in 50 years.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Congress has sent President Obama a $612 billion defense policy bill that he has threatened to veto over an continuing partisan battle about government spending.
